content: get ready to make the perfect summer top the harlee tee is a figure flattering design available in sizes xs-5x and three different length options pattern is written in us terms and includes a video tutorial for stitches used you will need 580-1400 yards of we crochet comfy color mist cotton yarn or similar worsted weight yarn crochet hook size i 5 5mm tapestry needle scissors sizes xs fits bust 28 -30 s fits bust 32 -34 m fits bust 36 -38 l fits bust 40 -42 xl fits bust 44 -46 2x fits bust 48 -50 3x fits bust 52 -54 4x fits bust 56 -58 5x fits bust 60 -62
